item.title: ||gan-a (spirits or dreams)
item.summary: The !kun call spirits (or dreams) ||gan-a. Other people in their country (namely the Makoba and the Ovaherero) call them different things when they speak of them.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-5
item.author: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: what the !kun call spirits or dreams
what other peoples in !kun country call them
